scripts.all_dev: npm run ci:qt-lib && npm run compile:qt-lib && npm run ci:all && npm run pretest:all && npm run package:all && npm run install-ext:all_sync
scripts.all: npm run ci:qt-lib && npm run compile:qt-lib && npm run ci:all && npm run ci-lint:all && npm run package:all && npm run install-ext:all_sync
scripts.all_sync: npm run ci:qt-lib && npm run compile:qt-lib && npm run ci:all_sync && npm run ci-lint:all_sync && npm run package:all_sync && npm run install-ext:all_sync
scripts.pretest:all: concurrently "npm run pretest" "npm run pretest:qt-lib" "npm run pretest:qt-core" "npm run pretest:qt-cpp" "npm run pretest:qt-ui" "npm run pretest:qt-qml"
scripts.pretest:all_sync: npm run pretest && npm run pretest:qt-lib && npm run pretest:qt-core && npm run pretest:qt-cpp && npm run pretest:qt-ui && npm run pretest:qt-qml
scripts.ci-lint:qt-lib: npm run checkStyle -- --dir="qt-lib" && npm run eslint -- --dir="qt-lib" && npm run checkPackage -- --dir="qt-lib"
scripts.ci-lint:all: concurrently "npm run ci-lint" "npm run ci-lint:qt-lib" "npm run ci-lint:qt-core" "npm run ci-lint:qt-cpp" "npm run ci-lint:qt-ui" "npm run ci-lint:qt-qml" "npm run checkChangelog:all_ext_pack"
scripts.ci-lint:all_sync: npm run ci-lint && npm run ci-lint:qt-lib && npm run ci-lint:qt-core && npm run ci-lint:qt-cpp && npm run ci-lint:qt-ui && npm run ci-lint:qt-qml
scripts.install-ext:all: concurrently "npm run install-ext:qt-core" "npm run install-ext:qt-cpp" "npm run install-ext:qt-ui" "npm run install-ext:qt-qml"
scripts.install-ext:all_sync: npm run install-ext:qt-core && npm run install-ext:qt-ui && npm run install-ext:qt-cpp && npm run install-ext:qt-qml
scripts.install:all: concurrently "npm install" "npm run install:qt-lib" "npm run install:qt-core" "npm run install:qt-cpp" "npm run install:qt-ui" "npm run install:qt-qml"
scripts.install:all_sync: npm install && npm run install:qt-lib && npm run install:qt-core && npm run install:qt-cpp && npm run install:qt-ui && npm run install:qt-qml
scripts.ci:all: npm ci && concurrently "npm run ci:qt-lib" "npm run ci:qt-core" "npm run ci:qt-cpp" "npm run ci:qt-ui" "npm run ci:qt-qml"
scripts.ci:all_sync: npm ci && npm run ci:qt-lib && npm run ci:qt-core && npm run ci:qt-cpp && npm run ci:qt-ui && npm run ci:qt-qml
scripts.package:all: concurrently "npm run package:qt-core" "npm run package:qt-cpp" "npm run package:qt-ui" "npm run package:qt-qml"
scripts.package:all_sync: npm run package:qt-core && npm run package:qt-cpp && npm run package:qt-ui && npm run package:qt-qml
scripts.compile:all: concurrently "npm run compile:qt-core" "npm run compile:qt-cpp" "npm run compile:qt-ui" "npm run compile:qt-qml"
scripts.compile:all_sync: npm run compile:qt-core && npm run compile:qt-cpp && npm run compile:qt-ui && npm run compile:qt-qml && npm run compile:qt-lib
scripts.checkChangelog:all_ext_pack: npm run checkChangelog:qt-all-pack && npm run checkChangelog:qt-wasm-pack && npm run checkChangelog:qt-cpp-pack
scripts._prepublish: npm run _prepublish_git && npm ci && npm run ci:qt-lib && npm run compile:qt-lib && npm run ci-lint:qt-lib
scripts.generateLicenses:all: concurrently "npm run generateLicenses:qt-core" "npm run generateLicenses:qt-cpp" "npm run generateLicenses:qt-ui" "npm run generateLicenses:qt-qml"
scripts.generateLicenses:all_sync: npm run generateLicenses:qt-core && npm run generateLicenses:qt-cpp && npm run generateLicenses:qt-ui && npm run generateLicenses:qt-qml
